markdownRemark.html: I am excited to share that our paper titled ‚ÄúAutomatically Identifying Shared Root Causes of Test Breakages in SAP HANA‚Äù has been accepted for presentation in the Software Engineering In Practice track at the 44th IEEE/ACM International Conference on Software Engineering (ICSE 2022). This collaborative work, conducted in partnership with COINSE and SAP Labs Korea üòâ, focuses on identifying the shared root causes among test failures. By accurately measuring the test failure similarity, we can group similar failures together before presenting them to developers, which will prevent an overwhelming number of bug reports. The study involves evaluating and comparing these similarity metrics using CI data from SAP HANA, a commercial database system. The investigation reveals that various information sources, such as static, dynamic, and historical data, complement each other, with the dynamic similarity metric performing best when used to measure the similarity between failures. I really look forward to presenting our work at ICSE 2022!

frontmatter.title: Automatically Identifying Shared Root Causes of Test Breakages in SAP HANA
FDG: A Precise Measurement of Fault Diagnosability Gain of Test Cases
